Furthermore, a reduction in gas occurs every time you have an "accident" such crushing on obstacles or opposing racers. There are a number of "drop" items you will be able to pick up throughout the game and a number of stopover points for refueling. You may also hinder your opponents by crushing them on obstacles.

105284.name: Slingo Supreme
105284.description:
Source: The Developer Website.

Slingo Supreme is the sequel to Slingo Deluxe that is packed with even more Slingtastic fun! It features a new and innovated Supreme mode that lets you build over 16000 different Slingo games. It also contains an infinite amount of Daily Challenges, new Powerups like Reel Nudge and Instant Slingos, and introduces the long awaited Devil Mini Games. Now you can finally take on that Devil and beat him at his own game!

105285.name: Twin Hawk
105285.description:
User Summary:

Twin Hawk is a shooter game in which you control a WWII fighter plane and your goal is to shoot all the enemy ground vehicles on your way. There are no enemy flying units, so there are no obstructions other than enemy fire. You, on the other hand, can call on a number of support planes which fly around you, and help you destroy enemy vehicles. On the downside, these planes are easily taken down by one shot. You can collect upgrades to your plane by destroying enemy transport trucks.

105286.name: Mad Caps
105286.description:
Source: The Developer Website.

Send bottle caps flying with every move to get your fill of tasty soda. Zap caps with ray guns, target them with rockets or let the alien transform them. Collect letters to spell mystery words along with other "under-the-cap" bonuses.
Let Mad Caps quench your thirst for fun!

Key Game Features:

■Unlimited play
■Three exciting play modes
■Seven crazy bonus caps
■Valuable "under-the-cap" bonuses
■Dizzying array of kooky bottle caps
■Fantastic music soundtrack and nutty sound effects

105287.name: Mozaki Blocks Deluxe
105287.description:
Source: The Publisher Website.

From the creator of Tetris® comes Mozaki® Blocks Deluxe, addictive mismatched fun of connecting like-colored blocks from the inside out. Grab a colored piece of blocks from the stack and place it on the board, connecting it to other same-color blocks. Form unbroken lines from the edge to center of the screen using pieces that match the color of the edge. Once connections are made, the level is beat!
Stack and connect colorful blocks for hours of endless fun!

Key Game Features:

■Two modes of play: Marathon or Timed
■Bonus tools for added help: Rainbow Pieces, Fire Pot, Eraser or Paint Bucket
■Crisp, bright graphics with an engaging soundtrack

105288.description:
Description from the publisher:

The Grand Melee is the second monthly Chapter Pack of the "A Tale of Champions" cycle of expansions for A Game of Thrones: The Card Game. It introduce sixty cards - three copies each of twenty never-before-seen characters, events, locations, and attachments to give you more A Game of Thrones specific multiplayer deck-building options than ever before.

This Chapter Pack delves deeper into the new keywords introduced in this cycle by introducing powerful characters with the Joust and Melee keywords like new versions of Robert Baratheon and Thoros of Myr. The Grand Melee also features more support for A Game of Thrones multiplayer game by way of cards that are designed to grow in strength when played against multiple opponents. Cards like the new Varys, Whisper Campaign, and The Smalljon will bring new threats and deadly surprises into your already-tense multiplayer games.
105288.name: A Game of Thrones: The Card Game – The Grand Melee

39953.name: A Game of Thrones: The Card Game

105289.name: Jewels of Sinai
105289.description:
Source: The Developer Website.

Bible Arcade is pleased to present the World's first Casual Game based on the timeless Biblical messages of Truth: Jewels of Sinai.
Our quest for addictive, mesmerizing, puzzle matching fun will take you on a journey from Ancient Egypt, across the Red Sea, through the burning desert sands to Mount Sinai. Work quickly to match same colored jewels. If your puzzle skills are strong you will unlock the mysteries of the Jewels of Sinai and witness the unfolding story of a peoples' cry for freedom and the clash between the gods of Egypt and the God of Abraham, Isaac and Jacob to rule the world. Play Jewels of Sinai today!

Features:
- 50 challenging levels
- Unlimited Game Play
- Illustrated Bible story
- Exciting power-ups

105290.description:
Another game of the Ravenburger Think Series. You could train your ability to remember names and hobbies of people you meet at a"party".
Everyone gets a number of people with their faces,names and hobbies. Then you roll and move around all the person from all players. When you hit a person for the first time you read aloud the name and the hobby of the person. being the second on a person´s portrait urges you to tell the name and the hobby.
Game when the 6th champaign bottle (on the die) was rolled
105290.name: Think: Namen & Gesichter

105291.name: Horus Line
105291.description:
The players must "pray" the mighty Horus, drawing from a bag wooden tokens in two different colours. The player in turn declares how many "pray token" will be able to draw from the bag, avoiding the negative colour. The player on the lefts has two options: he can overdeclare or he can "challenge". If he overdeclares, the player on his left can "challenge" or overdeclare and so on until one of the player challenges the last declaration. Now it's time to "pray", that is drawing one at a time, the tokens from the bag. A player succeeds if he's able to draw exactly the number of tokens declared without taking the wrong colour. If he fails the wrong token goes to the challenging player, while all the "pray tokens" go back into the bag.

The game was published in KidultGame's Game in a bag" line.

105292.description:
An ant colony is a place of feverish activity, where workers endlessly toil for the greater good of the superorganism. You are a worker ant, constantly moving detritus and foodstuffs from chamber to chamber. The problem is that other workers are bringing in more goods faster than you can sort out the old stuff! At the end of the day, the best that you can hope for is a chance to do it all over again tomorrow.

Myrmex is an olde style solitaire game for the Decktet. Two Decktets are required to play. The object of the game is to organize all of the cards into 6 piles that share a single suit and are in descending rank order from Crown to Ace.

Myrmex is an engaging and utterly addictive Spider solitaire experience. Don’t play this game if you have something important to do today.
105292.name: Myrmex

105293.name: Snowy: The Bear's Adventures
105293.description:
Source: The Publisher Website.

Snowy: The Bear's Adventures is all about awesome action and the coolest cartoon-style animation you've ever seen. The game stars an adorable polar bear who's trying to reach his home in the Frozen North. Standing in his way are hundreds of crazed monsters! To help Snowy to safety, you must run, jump and kick your way through 88 levels filled with goodies to grab.
Our hero's only defense is the snowballs he tosses that freeze his enemies in their tracks. This allows him to give them the boot! You'll enjoy trying to take out more than one monster at a time and using the bonuses that pop up when an enemy bites the dust. One allows Snowy to toss snowballs faster. Another plops him inside a miniature helicopter and lets him take out monsters without getting hurt. We challenge you to download this classic game today and get busy trying to top all the other Snowy fans with the highest score in the land!

105294.name: Snowy: Fish Frenzy
105294.description:
Source: The Publisher Website.

The cats in Snowy: Fish Frenzy have a single chance to march onscreen and walk away with their prize: one of the juicy fish Snowy has saved for dinner! Your job is to guide a slap-happy hand across the screen and give the felonious felines a quick smack between their ears. Doing so causes them to drop their booty and sends them flying off-screen, never to return!
As Fish Frenzy progresses, more and more cats appear at once, causing the game to ramp up to a madcap point-and-slap affair. Thankfully, several outrageous powerups are available to help. Just hit a tree and knock one out its leaves! You might get the Air Pump, which allows you inflate cats and send them drifting away like balloons.
Do we need to tell you the animation is awesome? Since this is a Snowy the Bear game, you know what to expect! And the sound is just as good. So download Fish Frenzy today and help our lovable bear protect his stockpile of yummy fish!

Key Game Features
- 80 levels of mouse-clicking merriment
- More than a dozen zany powerups
- Clean fun for the whole family
- Difficulty modes for every skill level
- Free technical support and updates
- A hug from Snowy. (Not really, but he will be grateful for your help!)

105295.name: Snowy: Lunch Rush
105295.description:
Source: The Publisher Website.

Snowy: Lunch Rush drops you into the madcap world of food service and challenges you to run the best restaurant in town. As you seat customers, take orders, deliver food, cash out clients and clean up their mess, you must earn money to stay open another day and upgrade your eatery. Before you know it, you'll be installing a drive-thru window, hosting VIPs and tuning your guitar to keep waiting customers happy!
Snowy: Lunch Rush features a 60-day adventure that grows more challenging with each new level. Do well, and you'll unlock three Endless modes in which you can purchase faster stoves, bigger tables and a better sound system as you strive to last as long as you can against an onslaught of hungry patrons.
The creators of Lunch Rush have made the game as appetizing to look at as it is to play, crafting top-notch animation and colorful restaurant environments that complement the fast-paced point-and-click gameplay. So what are you waiting for? Put in your order for Lunch Rush today!

Key Game Features
- 60 levels to beat
- Unlimited game time
- Bigger and better restaurants
- New upgrades in Endless Mode
- All of the hand-drawn comics
- An amazing finish for Snowy!

105296.name: Snowy: Puzzle Islands
105296.description:
Source: The Publisher Website.

Snowy: Puzzle Islands is an adventure through a colorful world made of switches, moving platforms, teleporters and locked gates. Your goal on each of the game's 100 levels is to use these objects to help Snowy reach the exit. Along the way, you can collect fruit bonuses and other goodies.
Puzzle Islands features a 60-level campaign for serious thinkers as well as an easier 40-level campaign designed to teach kids simple logic skills. Whether you're a seasoned puzzle game fan or just want to perform simple tasks while enjoying vibrant graphics and pleasant music, Puzzle Islands will appeal to you.
In addition to the original game, registered users can download the free Simple Tasks add-on and purchase our Brain Shaker expansion pack, making for hours of brain-teasing fun for Snowy fans everywhere!

Key game Features:

- 60 cleverly designed regular levels
- 40 easier levels for youngsters
- Gorgeous 3D graphics and animation
- Free hints and solutions available online
- Free technical support and updates

105297.name: Snowy: Treasure Hunter
105297.description:
Source: The Publisher Website.

Snowy isn't like other bears. While his friends are content to make their home on the ice, Snowy dreams of finding adventure as he travels the world! In Snowy: Treasure Hunter, the adorable white bear grabs his pick axe and shoulder bag, and sets out to rid three beautiful game worlds of the riches they contain. As he makes his way across the globe, he'll have to use his wits along with a selection of special items to outsmart enemies and grab every last jewel.
Snowy: Treasure Hunter is a side-scrolling platform game featuring stunning background art and film-quality character animation. As Snowy digs a hole in a platform to trap an approaching enemy or shimmies along a rope stretched between two platforms, you'll be amazed at the smoothness of the animation. There's no jumping, though, so Treasure Hunter is as easy to play as it is fun to look at. Download this modern classic today!

Key Game Features:
- More than 60 standard levels
- Over 30 additional stages for kids
- Free level hints and solutions
- Free upgrades to newer versions
- Full technical support

105298.name: Snowy: Treasure Hunter 2
105298.description:
Source: The Publisher Website.

Snowy is a restless bear who's always in search of his next great adventure. In Treasure Hunter 2, he embarks on a quest for riches through Africa, the Mayan jungles and the Far East. Each location consists of 20 levels filled with treasure to grab, enemies to avoid and puzzles to solve. Snowy's only tools are his wits, his agility and his trusty pick axe, so he needs all the help you can give him.
One of your tasks will be grabbing bonuses that can help Snowy survive. These include bombs can blow through walls and cages that can trap enemies before they reach our intrepid hero. You'll need these to be able to gather all of the gems on each level and open the portal to the next stage.
Treasure Hunter 2 features the best visuals and character animation to date in a Snowy game. Our hero comes to life as never before and the colors of the Mayan jungles seem to pop off the screen and fill the space around you. So download Treasure Hunter 2 today and begin the adventure of a lifetime!
Key Game Features:
- 60 all-new regular levels
- 30 all-new levels for kids
- Jaw-dropping new backgrounds
- Cunning new enemies to avoid
- Shiny new treasure to collect
- Bouncy new music
- Free online hints

105299.name: Snowy: Treasure Hunter 3
105299.description:
Source: The Publisher Website.

After winning a contest to manage the best restaurant in his hometown, Snowy the Bear grew restless. Upon seeing a newscast reporting on a mysterious castle from which no treasure hunters have emerged, Snowy packs his pick axe and satchel and sets off on an all-new adventure! As he makes his way through three beautiful environments, Snowy must collect all of the jewels and other trinkets on which he can get his paws while avoiding court jesters, dungeon masters, vampires and more!
Snowy: Treasure Hunter III is an arcade puzzle game in which you climb ladders, dig through platforms and use a variety of items to collect goodies and either trap or avoid enemies. As bears like to keep their feet on the ground, there isn't any jumping involved, although you will have to perform mental gymnastics to figure out how to gather all of the riches on each level while staying alive. If you loved the first two Snowy: Treasure Hunter games, you'll enjoy the third one even more!

Key Game Features:
- 85 challenging levels
- Three beautiful game worlds
- Unlimited game time
- Free upgrades to newer versions
- Full technical support

105300.name: Snowy: Space Trip
105300.description:
Source: The Publisher Website.

In Snowy: Space Trip, our courageous bear leaves the comfort of his arctic home and travels across space to rescue his alien friends from an army of nefarious robots. Your task is to guide Snowy as he runs and jumps his way across beautifully detailed levels, kicking robots in their metallic teeth and gathering his little green pals into a rocket ship for the trip home.
The more aliens you can collect and return to the rocket ship at once, the more points you'll earn. This isn't easy, as an assortment of mechanical monstrosities will do their best to stop you in your tracks. Luckily, you can use a variety of bonuses to help clear the way, including a pickup that makes Snowy invulnerable and another that clears all enemies from the screen.
Featuring 80 levels set in four unique worlds, awesome animation, the best music you can imagine and an easy setting for less experienced players, Snowy: Space Trip is an out-of-this-world adventure you won't want to miss!

Key Game Features:
- 80 levels of non-stop fun
- Four game worlds with unique bonuses and monsters
- Cartoon-style graphics and smooth animation
- Dynamic lighting and spectacular special effects
- Special Kids Mode with easy gameplay
- Finger-snapping music and explosive sound effects

boardgamehonor.21260: 2011 Deutscher Lernspielpreis "9 years and up" Nominee

105301.name: Familiengeflüster
105301.description:
Familiengeflüster, which is aimed at families with small children, is about the wishes of the different family members. The game starts with family members writing down their wishes by finishing a sentence on a randomly selected card, such as "You will ... together with me." Then, they select a family member who should fulfull their wish.

In the next round, they try to communicate their wish by drawing it on the back of another player. If they can communicate their wish correctly, they gain a happiness card; otherwise, they gain an out-of-luck card.

Finally, all players vote on which wish is the best, to determine a "family wish" that should be carried out before the next game of Familiengeflüster.

105303.name: Behütunsburg
105303.description:
In 13th century Bayern, family ties were strong, but for some, the lust for power was stronger. Rivalry among and within noble families would often lead to Machiavellian politics, outright theft and sometimes kidnapping. The Behütuns family was no different, as different branches of the family squabbled over money & subjects.

Gameplay:
Behütunsburg is a two-player card game usually played in 4 rounds. (Two copies of the game can be used to play with 3-4 players.)
Players will assemble a "court" of Barons & Knights with their Ladies, then a King and Queen, and finally adding a castle. Each of these elements are worth a certain number of victory points. Knights can be sent on quests to find treasure and more vassals for the King, (i.e. drawing more cards). Opposing players can attempt to disrupt plans by sending rogues to steal from the treasury or kidnap ladies, knights, barons or baronesses.

The round ends when a player with a complete court and castle discards their last card. Scores are totaled based on the victory points of the cards in play.
The goal is to have the most total victory points at the end of four rounds of play.

105304.name: Donjon (Spanish Edition)
105304.description:
From the Introduction:

"¡Bienvenido a Donjon! Puede que seas un rolero experimentado y quieras probar este juego, o quizá este sea tu primer juego de rol. Da igual, sigue leyendo.
Donjon es un emocionante juego de tipo hazlo-tú-mismo en el que pateas puertas, exploras oscuras mazmorras (o como nos gusta llamarlas: donjons), matas monstruos, encuentras tesoros y salvas a todos. Es un juego de rol de fantasía donde tú, el jugador, interpretas a un personaje ficticio en un mundo fantástico (y si eres el director de juego, normalmente
abreviado como DJ, puedes interpretar a montones de personajes diferentes).
La mejor analogía la brinda Ron Edwards, un diseñador de juegos que sabe lo que hace. Edwards compara un juego de rol con tocar en una banda: los miembros se juntan y deciden qué tipo de música quieren interpretar.
Una persona (el DJ) guía, y el resto de los miembros aportan lo que pueden para crear algo que es, idealmente, lo que desean. Es como tocar música en una banda: un miembro puede encontrar un riff excelente
que nadie esperaba pero al que todos se acoplarán.
Donjon es como una sesión de acid jazz. Está hecho para darle control a los jugadores: pueden iniciar un solo de guitarra o batería cuando lo deseen. Si algo suena bien, entonces pueden continuar. Aquí no hay un líder de la banda que vaya a cortarte el rollo."

In english from google translation:

"Welcom to Donjon! You might be a experienced rpg player and want to try this game, or maybe this is your first RPG. Anyway, read on.
Donjon is an exciting do-it-yourself type game in which you kick doors, explore dark dungeons (or as we like to call: donjons), kill monsters, find treasure and save all. It is a fantasy role-playing game where you, the player, play a fictional character in a fantasy world (and if you are the director of game, usually
abbreviated as DJ, you can play lots of different characters).
The best analogy is provided by Ron Edwards, a game designer who knows what he does. Edwards compares a role playing game with playing in a band: the members get together and decide what kind of music they want to interpret.
A person (the DJ) guide, and other members contribute what they can to create something that is ideally what you want. It's like playing music in a band: a member can find a great riff
than anyone expected but we all engage.
Donjon is like an acid jazz session. It is meant to give players control: they can start a single guitar or drums any time. If something sounds good, then you can continue. Here there is not a gang leader who will cut your roll."

105305.description:
Publisher's description:

Frank the farmer is proud of the delicious apples, pears, cherries and plums that grow in his garden. It's fruit crop day and Frank is in a really good mood. But what's this...?

Six ravens are sitting in the trees eating his fruits. "Watch out! I will get you!", he shouts. Will Frank be able to catch the naughty ravens before they steal all his fruits?
105305.name: Coraxis & Co.

105308.name: Twister Hoopla
105308.description:
Publisher's description:

It's a TWISTER game with a twist! Instead of the game mat, you get 16 colorful rings and five different ways to play! Game 1 challenges you to use your bodies to hold the rings in place and the last team standing wins. Game 2 is a ring toss with your hands and feet to catch! Game 3 is a race to make it to the finish line with colored rings in hand. Game 4 is a fun version of the traditional TWISTER game: scatter the rings and then call out the moves; but don't fall or you're out! Game 5 gets you all tangled up with other players as you reach for rings, hang on to your TWISTER and try to stay on your feet. Inside or out, this game makes sure you're ready to throw a TWISTER party just about anywhere!

105309.name: NBA ShootOut
105309.description:
User Summary

NBA ShootOut was the first entry in a first-party basketball series on the Sony PlayStation and PlayStation 2. It is a 3D basketball game featuring action which varied from its competitors by being more arcade-like and fast-paced.

105310.name: NBA ShootOut '97
105310.description:
From the back of the box

Nothing can beat the intense competition of NBA basketball, and now you can experience that action on your PlayStation with NBA SHOOTOUT '97. Every team and player in the NBA has been included so you'll find that your favorite team is intact. You can challenge a friend or the computer to a single game in the Exhibition mode, or try to prove that you are a master by leading a team to the World Championship in the Season mode. When you don't want to deal with a season, skip it and go straight to the Playoffs. All of the modes can be played as a simulation (that counts every foul and violation) or a wide-open arcade-style game that lets you run and gun without worrying about all the rules. The most innovative feature is the icon passing system that ensures you get the ball into the right player's hands. Now you can get some of the best basketball action available with NBA SHOOTOUT '97.

105311.name: NBA ShootOut '98
105311.description:
User Summary

NBA ShootOut '98 is the third installment in the basketball series and features updated rosters as well a new icon-passing system that allows players to pass the ball to a specific player instead of passing the ball at random, as was the case in basketball games before ShootOut '98. The box for the game mistakenly claims that this is the second installment in the series.

105312.name: NBA ShootOut 2000
105312.description:
From the back of the box

NBA ShootOut 2000 will be the basketball game by which all past and future basketball games will be compared to because of its? Incredible graphics, undaunted realism and amazingly realistic gameplay. No other game recreates the NBA like NBA ShootOut 2000. All new player graphics recreate each and every NBA player in amazing detail. Every position has been motion captured. Seven NBA players performed 300 new moves and 42 signature dunks. New Touch Shooting lets you control the accuracy of your shot. Incredible TV style action cameras put you in the middle of the action like never before. State of the art artificial intelligence translates into every NBA team playing exactly like their real life counterparts. If that's not enough, you can also design your own dunk using the revolutionary Create Dunk feature.

105313.name: NBA ShootOut 2001
105313.description:
From the back of the box

Fast, furious, authentic NBA action!
989 Sports' long-running b-baller makes its debut on the PlayStation 2 with live presentation unmatched on the system. The players sport thousands of motion-captured moves, and over a hundred hours of play-by-play were logged in the production. Everything in the stadium is modeled as closely as possible, from the detailed players to the real coaches on the sidelines to the people in the stands. ShootOut also brings back the Create Dunk feature, and refines the game's Touch Shooting and Passing control. As always, your choice is going to be a tough one between LIVE and ShootOut, and in the 2k1 basketball season, each has taken a shot at the game of basketball from a different angle. Check which fits your style.
Authentic players, animations, and arenas make this game so realistic you'll need high tops and wrist bands to play. It's got a new and improved game engine, redesigned player controls, and a TV-style presentation that has been edited to include more camera angles, close-ups, zooms, and cut-aways. Team-specific playbooks have more than 450 plays designed with the NBA elite. With the enhancements made to the Match-Up & Deny, Read & React A.I., no artificial intelligence has ever been more savvy. This year the road to the NBA Finals begins and ends with an NBA ShootOut.

105314.name: NBA ShootOut 2002
105314.description:
From the back of the box

If you love basketball (and you know you do), get ready for best thing since sliced bread. NBA SHOOTOUT 2002 takes the popular SHOOTOUT franchise to new heights, featuring the most realistic-looking action to date. The player models are created from a combination of photographs, motion-capture animation, and texture mapping which means the superstars and benchwarmers alike will appear just as they do in real-life. An updated game engine gives the play the feel of the NBA, and all of the new rules changes are in effect, too. The courts look like their real-life counterparts, with updates included for new floors like Seattle's. You choose your team, execute any desired trades, set your starting lineup, and pick through the playbook to create the most dominant squad in the league. High-flying dunks, touch shooting, and a sophisticated foul system make the NBA SHOOTOUT 2002 even more incredible than the beloved series installments that paved the way.

105315.name: NBA ShootOut 2003
105315.description:
From the back of the box

With all-new features including Career Mode, which allows you to create a player and take him from the National Basketball Development League (NBDL) to the NBA, and an unsurpassed NBA environment featuring new player models and interactions, NBA ShootOut 2003 is the must-have title for basketball and sports fanatics. Coupled with refined gameplay and restructured AI, NBA ShootOut 2003 replicates all the high-flying action of the NBA. The new player models are ultra-realistic as each player features animated texture-mapped faces from authentic NBA photos, accurate body styles down to players' tattoos, and optional customizing features including goggles, head, wrist and armbands. With accurate NBA playbooks, NBA signature animations, and consultation from over a dozen NBA stars, NBA ShootOut 2003 will have you lacing up your high-tops as you play the most authentic basketball game available.

105316.name: NBA ShootOut 2004
105316.description:
From the back of the box

NBA Shootout 2004 lets you play with the NBA elite. Build a dynasty of the ages with current NBA stars or legends such as Wilt Chamberlain, Moses Malone, Magic Johnson, or Clyde Drexler. Career mode allows you to create a player, join the Summer Pro League, earn a spot in the National Basketball Development League, and work your way through the ranks to get signed by the NBA. This year's NBA Shootout also gives you more control over plays with mid-air shot changes and mini-plays.

105317.name: Demon's World
105317.description:
User Summary:

In Demon's World you play a monster hunter and your goal is to clear each area by shooting down ghosts and other critters from various folklore. It is a scrolling platform game of many stages that include several interesting settings such as a pirate ship, an American old west setting, a medieval setting and more. You carry an upgradable weapon so collecting as many power-ups as you can is a wise thing to do.

105318.name: Lucky Luke: On the Daltons' Trail

videogameversion.119288: EU "The World of Lucky Luke" Windows edition

105318.description:
Back Cover:
Yep, the Daltons have escaped from jail yet again!

A hectic chase, duels with a host of desperados and all kinds of challenges await you behind every cactus.


Shooting, action, tests of strength... no less than 17 challenges!
Authentic Wild West in 3D.
A game for everyone to enjoy.

105319.name: Astro Fury
105319.description:
Source: The Publisher Website.

Featuring hot arcade action and teeth-rattling audio, Astro Fury pits you against a veritable onslaught of alien invaders. Your only defense: a single ship armed with plasma bursts and a stash of wicked secondary weapons. The creators of Magic Ball 2 have put their talents to good use in Astro Fury, creating some of the most jaw-dropping enemy attacks and memorable deep space backdrops ever seen in an arcade shooter. Can you save the galaxy once again? Download Astro Fury today and strap in for the fight of your life!

Key Game Features:
- 100 levels to beat
- 40 enemies to obliterate
- 16 different bonuses to use
- 18 upgrades for primary weapon
- 11 explosive secondary weapons
- Joystick support
- Free upgrades to new versions
- Free technical support

105320.name: Globy
105320.description:
Source: The Publisher Website.

This game is for those who love 3D-action and fun adventures. Fly on a legendary phoenix. Go through ancient mystical labyrinths. Play unusual card games. Face danger and discover secrets on your adventure. The main thing is to always move forward!
The main hero is a prince, Dreamy. He lives in the Globy world, very high up in the sky, in a castle on a flying island. One night he has a dream that his world is attacked by evil demons. He turns to the magi to ask their advice. The magi send Dreamy to search for 24 Globy Orbs, which, according to an ancient legend, possess a powerful magic force. The magi themselves do not offer Dreamy their help. The prince must go alone. You are going to join him on his adventure of searching for magic orbs and destroying the evil demons, thus saving the whole world.

Key Game Features:
- 24 levels of non-stop fun!
- 4 secret levels + 1 super secret level
- 200 locations
- 6 powerful spells
- 4 secret quest items
- 5 super bosses + extra secret boss
- 10 kinds of enemies
- Incredible Action

105321.name: Out Zone
105321.description:
User Summary:

The year is 2097. You are an elite cyborg soldier trying to repel an alien invasion force. Your only friends are your weapons and some cyborg soldiers who fight on your side. You must fight your way through seven stages of increasing difficulty and destroy the enemy boss at the end of each. Time, however, is not on your side either. So, collect as many energy pods and power-ups as you can, fend of wave after wave of malicious invaders, and be quick about it! Can you make it to the end and save Earth?

105322.name: Virtual Farm
105322.description:
Source: The Publisher Website.

Old MacDonald had a farm. Now you can, too, in Virtual Farmer, the game that puts you in charge of turning a struggling farm into a booming success! Choose your crops, till your ground, water your fields, harvest your produce and take your goods to market. Once there, you get to set the price! You'll have to keep a close eye on demand, though. Earn enough money and you'll be able to build processing plants that can turn your raw goods into exciting new products. With tons of upgrades to earn, plenty of customers to satisfy and easy-to-handle point-and-click fun, Virtual Farmer will have your entire family shoutin' YEE HAW!

Key Game Features:
- Eight kinds of crops to grow
- 15 plants to build
- 11 products to produce
- Three field upgrades (farm up to 60 fields)
- Dynamic market (demand changes every two minutes)

105323.name: Zen-Nippon Onna Pro Wrestling: Joou Densetsu
105323.description:
User Summary

Zen-Nippon Onna Pro Wrestling: Joou Densetsu is a Japanese professional wrestling game for the PlayStation.

The game features two modes of play: Title Match and Exhibition Match.

The roster contains 13 women from All Japan Pro Wrestling and 1 hidden wrestler that can be used in the exhibition mode.

105324.name: Virtual Farm 2
105324.description:
Source: The Publisher Website.

Raise bumper crops and then sell them for a profit in Virtual Farm 2! With a click of your mouse, you'll be digging up soil, planting crops, and harvesting the fruits of your labor. From there, you'll need to process your goods into the products people want. Cheese, ice cream, cakes and more are in demand at the market. Do you have what it takes to fill those orders and become the top farmer in town? Find out when you play Virtual Farm 2!

Key Game Features:
- Eight crops to grow
- Ten factories to build
- Ten products to produce
- Ten upgrades for the factories
- Learn-as-you-play tutorial

105325.name: Hacklopedia of Beasts (HackMaster 5th Edition)
105325.description:
publisher blurb

This is it, the definitive work by the esteemed sage Greytar. Within these pages he catalogues a collection of the most varied and interesting creatures that populate the Kingdoms of Kalamar. With the aid of his fellow field researchers, they present this data for all interested readers – be they mercenaries eager to devise effective strategies for combating known foes or magicians seeking to enhance their spellcasting repertoire. Only a foole would travel the realms deprived of this valuable material.

The fruit of years of extensive travel and personal experience, Greytar presents a complete picture of every creature incorporating sketches, personal accounts, known habitats, tracker’s guides, combat tactics and yield data to round out his general observations of the beasts.

105326.name: Luxor 2 + 3-Game Bonus Pack
105326.description:
Source: The Publisher Website.

In this bonus pack, wield your trusty scarab shooter to protect Egypt in LUXOR 2, play pranks and outwit Dwight in The Office, and travel through the depths of space in Ricochet Infinity, the out-of-this-world breakout game!

About LUXOR 2 3-Game Bonus Pack:

In this bonus pack, wield your trusty scarab shooter to protect Egypt in LUXOR 2, play pranks and outwit Dwight in The Office, and travel through the depths of space in Ricochet Infinity, the out-of-this-world breakout game!

LUXOR 2

LUXOR 2 takes you on a beautiful voyage through 88 all-new, gorgeously rendered levels set amongst the pyramids of ancient Egypt. Use your mystical winged scarab to shoot and destroy the approaching magical spheres, and to help you shoot them down, Luxor 2 features more explosive power-ups than ever before.

The Office

So you think you could survive the zany workplace of NBC's Emmy Award-winning comedy series The Office? Play pranks on your rivals to slow them down, earn points by helping out your co-workers, and avoid getting distracted by the office visitors, all while competing to be the best Dunder Mifflin paper salesperson you can!

Ricochet Infinity

Guide your spaceship to launch and keep galactic balls in play in order to eliminate bricks. Catch a multitude of amazing power-ups as they fall and become the Ringmaster Grand Champion!

105327.name: Friends (Always Stick Together)
105327.description:
User Summary

Control a rabbit and turtle, one carries the other, and you can switch at will. The rabbit carrying turtle can move quickly, and attack airborne creatures with slingshot. The turtle carrying hare moves slowly, but the hare can attack ground creatures with a stick. Collect fruit to score, while avoiding enemies and bombs.

105328.name: The Pond
105328.description:
User Summary

A number of ducks are floating in a pond. Your goal is to feed them acorns, clicking the mouse button causes a ripple which pushes the acorn, hit a duck and score points. A certain color duck in the upper right hand corner grants bonus points when fed, this also increases your time limit.

105329.name: Arctic Blue
105329.description:
User Summary

Control a whale. The whale spouts, and a boat floats up on the spray. Use this ability to avoid icebergs and airplanes. Score points, and increase time limit by grabbing cargo.

105330.name: Hungry Spiders
105330.description:
User Summary

Protect your cake from hungry spiders. You throw rubber balls at the spiders as they drop, to knock them out. Knock out a lady bug to get a more powerful weapon temporarily.

105331.name: Panda Run
105331.description:
User Summary

Control a panda, running through a forest of bamboo. Jump and lanterns to gain points, mushrooms give energy, spheres give bonus energy or invincibility. Avoid obstacles such as birds.

105332.name: Abra Academy
105332.description:
Source: Developer Website.

Wanda has always wanted to be a witch. She and her friends have made it all the way to Abra Academy, and they need your help to graduate! Guide Wanda through various rooms in Abra Academy, and aid her in finding hidden objects. Each room will put her witching skills to the test. The more items she finds, the faster she can graduate. Start your studies at Abra Academy!

The game Features:

- 24 levels.
- Helpful fairy guides.
- Bonus items.

105333.name: These Little Pigs
105333.description:
User Summary

A number of pigs floating on balloons go by. Make them jump, and try to get them to land on the pig on the ground, or the tower created by additional pigs, grab sweets for points, and clocks for extra time.

105334.name: A Cupid's Day
105334.description:
User Summary

Control Cupid as he flies through the skies. Shoot hearts floating in clouds with your arrows. Once you expose the heart, hit it again to score.

105335.name: Abra Academy: Returning Cast
105335.description:
Source: The Developer Website.

There have been several strange attacks on Abra Academy. It seems that some unknown creatures have broken into the campus and are causing havoc! The children are frightened and the monsters are creating a huge mess. Wanda and her friends have been called in to investigate the attacks and find a way to stop them.

The game Features:

- Use the Crystal Ball for help.
- 100’s of Hidden Objects.

105336.name: Fishball
105336.description:
User Summary

There is a ball, you collect fish in the ball. Move the ball by hitting it with the cursor. Collect more fish for more points, avoid the pufferfish.

105337.name: Roperunner
105337.description:
User Summary

Control a critter, who tries to rope other critters. Rope more than one in a single shot for bonus points. Some critters cut your rope, avoid them. Some give you a better weapon. Avoid being hit. Collect red balls for extra time/energy (kept track on same bar).

105338.name: False Pretenses
105338.description:
From the Introduction:

This Warhammer Fantasy Roleplay 3rd edition scenario is designed for characters in their 1st or 2nd careers. This scenario is set in early spring, 2521 in the Imperial province of Nordland, but can easily be adapted to other areas. It is based on an adventure hook from the WFRP2 Sigmar's Heirs supplement by Anthony Ragan and the Realms of Sorcery supplement materials on Waystones. Neither of these supplements is required to run this scenario.

105339.name: Wolfship
105339.description:
From "Using This Scenario"

This Warhammer Fantasy Roleplay 3rd Edition scenario is designed for 1st or 2nd rank characters.
This scenario is based on an adventure hook by Andrew Law, et al in Shades of Empire, however that supplement is not required for use. This scenario roughly follows the adventure, False Pretenses and is set in spring, 2521 in Hargendorf in Nordland. It can easily be moved to other ports in Nordland or even Marienburg.

105341.name: The Blue Mountains
105341.description:
From the Players' Introduction:

The red-haired Vanir Norsemen live in a harsh northern wilderness. They are under constant threat of raiders, giants, and nature itself.
You are brave warriors here, but have not yet made a name for yourselves. King Sorskadi has summoned you for a chance to fulfill your destinies.

rpgitemversion.119368: The Good Games Guide Version (Original Version)

105343.name: The Web of Eldaw
105343.description:
From the Introduction

This is a scenario designed for the Warhammer Game System, and can be played either with the Warhammer Role Play game, or with the Warhammer Battle Rules (or even with both). The game consists of a dungeon adventure, deep inside The Web of Eldaw - a system of labyrinthine caverns. The scenario can be played out using any other suitable gaming system, so long as you are prepared to change stats and minor details as you go along. Stats for Warhammer Role Play and Battle Rules are provided. Note that two values are given for the Wounds characteristic eg, 1/10. The first number is used for Warhammer Battle Rules, the second Role-Play. All other stats are identical.

The game can be played by 2-4 players taking the roles of the characters described, plus GM. If two or three players are to attempt the adventure, the two characters Giltbrook and Mickelson can be run by either one player or by the Rolando player as 'henchmen'.

105344.name: Madden NFL Arcade
105344.description:
Source: The Publisher Website.

Feel the excitement of the NFL with a fun, fast-paced, 5-on-5 football experience. Madden NFL Arcade brings the 10 best players from each of the 32 NFL teams on offense and defense together to battle it out on the gridiron. No penalties, no clock, just pure adrenaline, as each team has four downs to march 60 yards downfield for the score.

Catch your opponent off-guard with Game Changers that allow you to break the game wide open in a single play! Play with 1-4 players on a single console, or take your game online with ranked/unranked matches, lobbies, leaderboards, and more. Madden NFL Arcade takes everything you love about your favorite NFL stars and stadiums and brings them to life in a fun, high-scorng gridiron battle!

105345.name: Tank Battles
105345.description:
Source: The Publisher Website.

Take control of your WW2 tank and challenge friends and online opponents in crazy, over-the-top tank battles! Enjoy classic run-and-gun gameplay in over 50 levels of bullet bouncing action. Adapt your strategy to each location as you collect power-ups while dodging enemy fire. Fire a ricochet shot or drop mines to prevent enemy tanks from following you. Destroy blocks to reach tactically important territory, and much more! Tank Battles offers the ultimate multiplayer experience: Addictive classic gameplay enriched with tons of features, game modes and custom options.

105346.name: R-Types
105346.description:
From the Back of the Box

Do you enjoy fiendishly frantic game play? In this challenging opportunity, you'll be taking on 2 classic arcade shooters, R-Type and R-Type II. The successful candidate will go up against gigantic bosses, destroy strange alien creatures, and in genera, commit mayhem on a daily basis. Must relocate to strange worlds across 14 action packed stages. No experience necessary. For the retro gaming experience of a lifetime, inquire within.

105347.name: Phozon
105347.description:
Phozon (フォゾン) is an arcade game that was released in by Namco in 1983 only in Japan.
Gameplay

The player controls a small black atom with red spikes called a Chemic, which can adhere itself to passing Moleks, which come in four different colours: cyan, green, pink and yellow. It must use these to duplicate the shape shown in the middle of the screen. When you successfully do this, you will get bonus points. There is also a malevolent clump of balls called the Atomic that floats around the screen, and will destroy your helpless Chemic if it merely touches it. If a Molek goes into the wrong place, press the reject button to throw it back. Every four stages there is a challenging stage where your Chemic can shoot Moleks in four directions at the Atomic. From World 2 onwards, there are Power Moleks that will let your Chemic attack the Atomic for a short period of time. They don't last for that long, though.

Source: Wikipedia, "http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Phozon,"; available under the CC-BY-SA License.

105349.name: Cra$h
105349.description:
Cra$h is a simple dice game that utilizes probabilities, luck, and a lot of book keeping to simulate the vagaries of the stock market. The game is comprised of six rounds were each player takes a turn to try and beat the odds or try not to lose too much money.

Cra$h is a simple game and was envisioned to help parents encourage basic mathematics skill and to open children up to the idea of the stock market.

Cra$h uses 6 ten sided dice as the amount of money you wager on the stock market. you may choose to roll up to all six dice. This is then compared to the market mood die (the 7th d10) anything below this number loses cash(k), anything that beats the market gains cash(k), anything that matches gains 10k.When a Player rolls triples it causes a crash and all players need to roll to see how much they lost. With each player starting with only 50K this game is fast!

The game continues until there is only one player left or whoever has the most money at the end of six rounds.

Leiker Games
Give us a "Leik" on Facebook!

105350.name: Starship! The Game of Space Exploration
105350.description:
-Summary-
In Starship! you play as the captain of an enterprising ship and her crew searching for valuable cargo amongst the stars. Each turn you will be upgrading your ship, stowing away cargo, exploring new star Sectors and fighting to keep shield, weapons, and engine upgrades out of the hands of your opponents!

-Overview-
The game of Starship! is played in a series of turns where players reveal Star Sectors in order to conquer them and claim their resources. Other players may hinder your conquest by playing cards onto the revealed Star Sector card. If you you claim the cards in the Star Sector pile and can use those cards for Ship System upgrades, hindering your opponents or stowing one as cargo.

Leiker Games
Give us a "Leik" on Facebook!

105351.name: Boulevard Tycoon
105351.description:
Tabloid Tycoon is a business simulation game released in 2005 in which you run a scandalous newspaper. The aim is to sabotage your rivals, settle lawsuits, give would-be paparazzi jobs and take pictures of the most scandalous things. You have to build your empire so as to make newspapers fresh out of the press.

Source: Wikipedia, "Tabloid Tycoon", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

105353.name: Cooking Academy
105353.description:
Source: The Developer Website.

Grab your oven mitts and don your Chef’s Hat! Cooking Academy is the game that places you in the kitchen of a prestigious culinary school! From Eggrolls to Pancakes, from Ravioli to Crème Brulee, it’s up to you to prepare over 50 different recipes! Learn interesting trivia about food while mastering the skills of chopping, kneading, mashing, flipping, frying, and much more!
Unlock new recipes and trophies by passing your cooking courses and exams. Are you ready to be a Master Chef? Well then it’s time to enroll at the Cooking Academy!

The Full Version of Cooking Academy features:
- Over 50 Unique Recipes
- 5 Courses to Master: Appetizers, Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner, and Dessert
- 38 Different Mini Games
- 8 Trophies with 4 different rankings to unlock

105354.name: The American Civil War: A Rank & File Supplement
105354.description:
From their website:

A Supplement to Crusader Publishings Rank and File Rulebook.

The American Civil War supplement for Rank & File includes a historical background to the war as well as game aids that can be used with any rules system. There are optional and period specific rules as well as detailed weapon statistics, command ratings and army organisation.

Almost 1000 leader ratings for both sides of the conflict and army lists that are broken down by theatre and year allow players to design their own scenarios, create balanced forces for pick up games or calculate troop quality and strength for historical battles.

This supplement adds a further level of detail to the command and control aspect of Rank & File with a comprehensive order system that takes account of leader ratings, orders issued, distances and staff quality. Optional army morale rules allow large or small games to be played to a definite conclusion within an evening. This allows players to game larger conflicts with all of the problems and uncertainty of command that was a factor in so many ACW battles.

While much of the material included is of use with any rules system a copy of the Rank & File rules are required to gain the most from this supplement.

48page full colour perfect bound A4

105355.name: March Attack: Napoleonic Wargame Rules
105355.description:
From their website:

Napoleonic Wargames Rules.

March Attack are presented as an 80 page A4, full colour, perfect bound book. The rules are designed to allow players to fight large battles with battalion sized units in a reasonable amount of time.

Command and control, orders and morale for large formations are combined with easy to learn tactical game mechanics so that battles of a Corps or more a side
can easily be fought by a few players during an evening. Each unit on the table represents a battalion of infantry, regiment of cavalry or battery of artillery.

A ground scale of 1" to 60 yards, one turn representing 20 minutes and fast paced strategic movement rules mean that battles play out at a realistic rate. Combat is dealt with in a manner that allows large numbers of units to be fielded and the interaction between strategic movement and tactical combat allows for a fast paced game that keeps a good level of detail.

Seven different training and morale levels combined with the historical strength of a unit introduces the concept of ‘Combat Value’. This ties together all of the tactical rules and ensures that troop quality, more than just luck or buckets of dice, plays an important part in every battle.

105356.name: Cooking Academy 2: World Cuisine
105356.description:
Source: The Developer Website.

Welcome to the World Culinary Workshop! Cooking Academy 2 will put you in the kitchens of restaurants from all corners of the globe. From Chinese BBQ Pork Buns, to Mexican Tamales, to Japanese Sushi, make your way through 60 different recipes from eight different countries! Learn interesting trivia about food while mastering all new skills and mini-games including food processors, mixers, raiding the fridge and much more!Unlock new recipes and trophies as you complete recipes and exams in each of the eight restaurants. Are you ready to cook foods from around the world? Then get ready for a culinary adventure with Cooking Academy 2: World Cuisine!

The Full Version of Cooking Academy 2 features:
- 60 Unique Recipes
- 8 Countries to Master: China, Italy, America, India, Thailand, Mexico, Japan, and France
- 50 Unique Cooking Games
- 11 Trophies with 4 different rankings to unlock

105357.name: World Mosaics
105357.description:
Source: The Developer Website.

Your associate, Dr. Remington, has unearthed a relic of the mysterious and elusive Pelasgians, or "Sea People". In order to unravel the mysteries of a civilization that disappeared over a thousand years ago, you must solve the pictographic puzzles they left behind to safeguard their history.Your quest begins in Greece, in the very shadow of the Majestic Parthenon, but it just may take you around the world before you are through!

The Full Version of World Mosaics features:

- 99 puzzles in Story Mode
- Over 100 Extra Puzzles
- 7 Exotic Locations including Greece, Egypt, India, and Japan!
- Over 10 Hours of Addictive Gameplay!

105358.name: World Mosaics 2
105358.description:
Source: The Developer Website.

Return to the puzzle adventure that takes you around the world! Having tracked the origins of the Sea People to the legendary city of Atlantis, the power of a magical hourglass has taken you back through time! Solve your way from the wonders of the Jurassic period, through the Dawn of Civilization, to the glorious Renaissance as you restore the hourglass of the Pelasgians and return to your own time!Play through 98 challenging puzzles in the Story Mode and then tackle another 152 Extra Puzzles!

The Full Version of World Mosaics 2 features::
- 98 puzzles in Story Mode
- 152 Extra Puzzles
- Time Travel through 7 Eras
- Over 10 Hours of Addictive Gameplay!

105359.name: World Mosaics 3: Fairy Tales
105359.description:
Source: The Developer Website.

The next chapter in puzzle adventure awaits! After restoring the city of Atlantis, you discover a magical book that sends you on a journey through literature in World Mosaics 3: Fairy Tales! Solve pictographic puzzles on your way through the stories of the Frog Prince, Babe the Blue Ox, Sleeping Beauty, and 9 other classics as you restore the magical book to return home!

The Full Version of World Mosaics 3: Fairy Tales features:
- 156 unique puzzles in Story Mode
- 12 Fairy Tales: Frog Prince, Rapunzel, Anasi, Monkey King and more!
- 100 unique Extra Puzzles
- Over 10 Hours of Addictive Gameplay!

105360.name: World Mosaics 4
105360.description:
Source: The Developer Website.

The Atlantis World Museum has risen from the depths of the ocean. However, all the exhibits have been completely destroyed! Travel back in time and solve pictographic puzzles to restore the lost artifacts. Journey to the Pharaoh’s Tomb, the Silk Road, Stonehenge, and eleven other exciting locales as you restore the Atlantis World Museum!

The Full Version of World Mosaics 4 features:
- Over 150 Story Mode Puzzles
- Recover lost artifacts from Egypt, China, and more exciting locales!
- 99 Bonus Puzzles
- Over 10 hours of addictive gameplay!

105361.name: Farmers Market
105361.description:
Source: The Developer Website.

Welcome to your own personal Farmers Market! Sell products like eggs, milk, beef, and corn. Or combine ingredients to sell freshly-made waffles, barbecue, ice cream, fruit pies, and much more!Attract new customers with a band, and increase the price of your food with blue ribbon contests. Create markets in the city, the desert, at campgrounds, the pier, and many other exciting locations. It’s up to you to build a bustling farm-fresh marketplace!

The Full Version of Farmers Market features:
- 60 fun levels!
- 8 unique locations!
- 17 trophies to collect!
- 38 unique foods to create and sell!

105362.name: FishCraft
105362.description:
Source: The Developer Website.

FishCraft is an action packed physics game in which the player helps the fish get revenge against the cats for consuming their friends and family. The cats have constructed mighty fortresses to protect themselves, but the fish pack a heavy arsenal in 63 levels of cat smashing action.

105363.name: Elite Pinball HD
105363.description:
Source: The Publisher Website.

This is classic Pinball at its finest; Elite Pinball HD serves up a big portion of fun and addictive gameplay that will bring back fond memories of yesteryear. Explore the table through challenging and rewarding missions to prepare for an encounter with one of the strongest foes of the game, the Elite Boss. Save top scores, gain bonus balls, and warp into a new era of HD pinball!!

105364.description:
How quickly can your teammates guess what you draw?
Stress, Laughter & nerve.
In 45 seconds you have to draw so the team can guess right. The words to be guessed and drawn is pulled out of a bag, and for every correct word you get to add the tiles on the board. The first team to 20 correct answers wins. But beware of the "art thief", he steals the tiles from your team if the other teampulls him from the bag.
105364.name: Vad ritar Picasso?

105365.name: Six Gun Saga
105365.description:
From the Developer's Website
Six Gun Saga is a turn based strategy game set in the Wild West. Players assume the role of one of seven Bosses vying for control of a fictitious no-name town.

It’s All About The Choices…..

The Good Ones…..
Hire the meanest and toughest dudes to fight your battles.

The Bad Ones….
Keep you books balanced by cashing in cards that you would really like to use another way.

And The Ugly Ones…..
Send your posses out to claim Victory Points from story cards that seem hopeless without an ace (or two) in the hole.

105367.name: Teenage Mutant  Hero Turtles Card Game
105367.description:
Card game for 2-5 players from ages 7 and up.

The purpose of the game is to be the first to collect all 4 turtles. every turn the players take a card from the face-down stack and put one from their hand on the face-up stack. Shredder card get their own stack. There are 3 special types of cards which let you skip a turn, take two shredder cards or change the turn-order.

105368.name: Shining Wind
105368.description:
User Summary

Shining Wind is an action RPG and the game following Shining Tears. It was never released outside of Japan.

105369.name: Shining Hearts
105369.description:
User Summary

An RPG released for the PSP in Japan. A young swordsman meets a girl who has lost her memories and emotions, collect and give her hearts earned from other character through dialogue or battle actions in order to restore her memory and continue the games story.

105370.name: The GM's Toolbox: The Resource Catalog
105370.description:
From Introduction:

When running games of Outbreak: Undead, a crucial component of the game is the gathering and spending of Resource by the players. There is generally a question as to what a character would be able to find and subsequently purchase with the Resource they find. Under most circumstances, the rules in the book are more than sufficient at covering a broad range of common items that can be found in the garage, storeroom, behind counters, etc. But this may not be enough for the GM who knows a location well enough to know precisely what is available and in roughly what quantity. Also, a GM who desires to inspire a higher degree of fear in their players by making certain resources extremely finite (even those that are otherwise common) would benefit from adapting the rules in the Outbreak: Undead core rulebook to incorporate such a frightening reality. An entirely optional, but efficient, way to accomplish this is by using a "Resource Catalog".

A "Resource Catalog" is a list of what a character is able to purchase with their available Resource. What is on this list is based on the locations that the characters loot during missions or what kind of location they are in when the game starts. For most scenarios, the items are automatically added to the catalog once the location is successfully searched. The master list that a can be purchased from when characters are in their Stronghold is the "Strongohld Resource Catalog". Otherwise, purchases can only be made in the location they are found in.

105371.name: Things That Go "Crash" In The Night...
105371.description:
From Introduction:

As terrifying as waves of zombies can be, the thought of one monster being a continual threat in addition to the many horrors of the zombie apocalypse is especially frightening. They can take many forms and there is no shortage of examples of these sort of terrors in popular culture. One antagonist of either exceptional strength, cunning, or madness... or any combination of the three appearing to attack at random is a terrifying element that can be added to any Outbreak: Undead campaign. In this issue, we explore how this creature can be introduced and what sort of missions that can surround their appearance and which ones can lead to their climactic destruction.

105372.name: Friends and Enemies: The Art of Diplomacy
105372.description:
From Introduction:

The majority of the rules in the core rulebook operate under the assumption that all the player characters are on the same side and readily cooperate towards a common goal. The only people to potentially react differently are those who are encountered randomly, either in the form of Survivors or other members of The Living... this is far from reality, unfortunately.

Group dynamics are an important aspect of survival and a group that works well together will stand a much greater chance at succeeding. This may not be a factor that has to be introduced artificially by a GM. The conflict within the players themselves are almost a guarantee if you are playing a campaign. The players will have a very clear idea as to what strategy would work best for survival and doubtless there will be those that agree as often as there will be those that don't. How this conflict is to be resolved is an important part of running the game.

105373.name: November 2010: Horror Traits
105373.description:
User summary:

A collection of Horror Traits, Missions, Formations, Stronghold Upgrades and additional zombie types.

105374.name: January 2011: Missions
105374.description:
From Introduction:

This volume of Free Content Friday kicks in the new year with a series of missions that allow general population more flexibility and gives them some fighting ability as well. The players will find themselves with expanded search options and the ability to rally broken formations during zombie encounters. While this month's Free Content Friday clearly favors the surviors, who knows what dangers await the players next month?

105375.name: February 2011: The Cursed OBM Scenario
105375.description:
From Introduction:

The Cursed - OBM Scenario

You have been holed up inside of your stronghold for too long. Their numbers are growing, and there are only a few of you left. Food is short, but you have enough stored up to make a break for the countryside. Maybe with a little luck you could try your chances in the wilderness instead of this concrete hell.

105376.name: FCF 007: Yesterday is not Tomorrow
105376.description:
User summary:

A collection of spy-themed character types, Missions, Strongholds and equipment.

105377.name: Full Moon in San Francisco
105377.description:
User Summary

You start the adventure by choosing your character’s gender, his characteristics, and how much money to start out with - even the type of pet! This is a "point-and-click" adventure game. All the selections you make in the beginning of the game have an impact on how the game is played out from start to finish.
You are young, you’re looking for a job, and you have always dreamed of becoming a Private Investigator. You were born in a small town in California called Gillibel, and as a Private Investigator wanna-be, your hope is to get hired by one of the many investigative agencies in California, possibly in San Francisco. In the beginning, things don’t go exactly as planned. Your local employment office in Gillibel doesn’t seem very interested in helping you - But, just when you’ve almost lost your hope, you unexpectedly get lucky! The very famous investigative agency "Copper & McIntosh" in San Francisco is looking for a new PI to hire. A once in a lifetime opportunity - not to be missed!
The game contains mystery, magic and humor along with puzzle-solving. The static, hand-drawn graphics appear in a slide-show fashion, but react to what you do in the game.

105378.name: The Great Net Spellbook
105378.description:
User Summary:

The Great Net Spellbook (GNSB) is a homemade collection and compilation of spells, submitted by fans, for Advanced Dungeons & Dragons (2nd Edition). The book was originally a collection of homemade spells collected from the Usenet group rec.games.frp.dnd. However, as time progressed and the world-wide web became more popular, spells were submitted and collected from a wide variety of places.

The GNSB has gone through 6 editions, each one being thoroughly checked for licensing and copyright validations and each edition adding its own unique. The last edition came out in 1995 with over 1800 spells available for use.

105379.name: Hexomino
105379.description:
Hexomino is a logical game played on hex game board. The players place alternately six-colour plastic tiles on the board, so it matches at least two tiles on the board. Who can't place any tile onto the board, must draw three tiles. The player who first run out of tiles, is the winner.
There is a more complex variant of the game, in that every player place tiles on his/her own board, considering certain rules of simmetry of the tile's formations.

105380.name: Eberron: Continent of Khorvaire Map
105380.description:
Publisher blurb:

Khorvaire is a disparate land. In the wake of the devastating Last War, what was once the largest single kingdom has been broken into smaller ravaged nations, struggling to rebuild while nursing long-held grudges and rivalries. While exhausted from the brutality of conflict, these nations stockpile weapons, dispatch spies and commit acts of sabotage against one another in a prelude to yet another bitter war. Yet beyond these conflicts, forces work to bring about the evolution of the inscrutable Draconic Prophecy.

This campaign map details Khorvaire, the primary setting for DUNGEONS & DRAGONS campaigns in the world of EBERRON. Packed with details, this map is a great way to chart your adventures in the aftermath of the Last War.

Gale Force Nine’s Official DUNGEONS & DRAGONS Campaign Maps are high-quality single-sided vinyl surfaces that are ideal for tracking the progress of your adventures during their campaigns! These maps lay flat for ease of play. The maps may be marked with WET-ERASE markers to temporarily record the paths your heroes travel, make notes about encounters and locations or the modify landscape to suit your own campaign. They also look great on the wall of your game room! The Campaign Maps measure 30” x 42". All of GF9's Campaign Maps are based on artwork provided by Wizards of the Coast.

105381.name: Forgotten Realms World Map
105381.description:
Publisher blurb:

Welcome to Faerûn, a land of amazing magic, terrifying monsters, ancient ruins, and hidden wonders. The world has changed since the Spellplague, and from this arcane crucible have emerged shining kingdoms, tyrannical empires, mighty heroes, and monster-infested dungeons.

This campaign map details Faerûn, the setting for DUNGEONS & DRAGONS campaigns in the FORGOTTEN REALMS. Packed with details, this map is a great way to rediscover ancient lands, explore lost locations and confront dread threats.

Gale Force Nine’s Official DUNGEONS & DRAGONS Campaign Maps are high-quality single-sided vinyl surfaces that are ideal for tracking the progress of your adventures during their campaigns! These maps lay flat for ease of play. The maps may be marked with WET-ERASE markers to temporarily record the paths your heroes travel, make notes about encounters and locations or the modify landscape to suit your own campaign. They also look great on the wall of your game room! The Campaign Maps measure 30” x 42". All of GF9's Campaign Maps are based on artwork provided by Wizards of the Coast.

105382.name: Plumbers Don't Wear Ties
105382.description:
From the back of the box

He's a plumber, she's a daddy's girl. Only you can get them together, or tear them apart! Plumbers have everything: Greed, sex, spirituality, white-knuckle chases, shameful propositions, a nun, humor, true love, jaded love, jealousy, taut action, comedy, a bad guy, a good guy, a hero, spine-tingling suspense, a hot babe, brazen bravado, a damsel in distress, and a Hollywood ending! Plays like a game... feels like a movie!

105383.name: Culvert Operations (Swords and Wizardry)
105383.description:
From the back cover:

The city of Bargarsport sits upon the sunken ruins of the old city - and the underground temple of Clandestine. But the temple's faithful are a conniving lot, and require the PCs to face down a necromancer and his undead minions moving into the underground city before they will help.

105384.name: Wayne's World (NES,GB)
105384.description:
User Summary

Wayne's World for the NES and Game Boy is a sidescrolling platform game released in 1993 as a tie in to the movie of the same name. A game of the same name was also released for the SNES and SEGA Genesis but features a different plot and level design.

105385.name: The Wizard of Oz
105385.description:
From the back of the box

Go on a quest to find the wizard in THE WIZARD OF OZ. Take control of Dorothy, The Scarecrow, The Tin-Man, and The Cowardly Lion as they embark on 31 levels of action and excitement. The will have to explore everything from burning deserts to crystal halls. If this foursome is to survive, they must solve a variety of puzzles and navigate mysterious mazes. The action of the game is intensified with 13 different soundtracks including four from the film. Will these adventurers have their wishes fulfilled by the wizard? Find out by playing THE WIZARD OF OZ.

rpg.1297: Old School Reference and Index Compilation (OSRIC)

105386.name: Eruptor's Vengeance
105386.description:
From the rear cover:

A dead dragon leaves his treasure unguarded. Or so they say. A Quick Play Adventure designed for one or two game sessions. A adventure for characters 2nd to 4th level.

105387.name: Wayne's World (SNES,Genesis)
105387.description:
User Summary

Wayne's World for the SNES and Genesis is a sidescrolling platform game released in 1993 as a tie in to the movie of the same name. A game of the same name was also released for the NES and Game Boy but features a different plot and level design.

105388.name: Sword Master
105388.description:
Sword Master is a side-scrolling action game developed for the Nintendo Entertainment System. The game is set in medieval fantasy setting and focuses primarily on strategic fighting using shield and sword.

Gameplay
Sword Master is a side-scrolling action game in which the player must use sword and shield to battle through 7 game levels, from the forest, to a cursed town, to multiple levels of the villain's castle lair. The player encounters giant bats, wolves, skeleton warriors, evil knights, wizards, lizard men, gargoyles, and other fierce enemies on his quest. The Sword Master can swing his sword, defend with his shield, and gather power-ups which enable him to change his form. For example, the Sword Master can transform into a mage and cast offensive magic spells.

Source: Wikipedia, "Sword Master (video game)", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

105389.name: Superman (NES)
105389.description:
Superman is the title of an NES video game based on the popular DC Comics character and the first two films of the same name. The game is a combination of side-scrolling action mixed in with some puzzles. While the US release contains an original soundtrack, the Japanese Famicom release features a synthesized version of the film's score.

Gameplay
In the game, the player controls Superman on a quest to save the city of Metropolis from the evil Lex Luthor and a gang of criminals that were exiled from the planet Krypton. The game had an overhead map of various locations in the city that the player can travel to, with animated scenes, but then the gameplay would switch to a more traditional side-scrolling adventure game.

Superman has an energy (Super Power) bar and he can collect various icons in the game to use a limited supply of one of his item powers: x-ray vision (make certain enemies visible), superflight, super spin, heat vision (laser attack), and ice breath 1 and ice breath 2 (freeze enemies). One of the main difference from the comics was that Superman's x-ray vision was used to make invisible enemies visible. The instruction booklet explained that glitch by claiming that "Superman is now unable to see inside buildings, as Lex has lined all the buildings in Metropolis with lead!" Aside from the item powers, Superman can also jump and punch. Players start out the game as Clark Kent but can change into Superman (provided that they have enough Super Power) by entering into one of the phone booths that are scattered throughout the city. However, taking sufficient damage from enemies would cause Superman to become Clark Kent. Whenever Superman entered the Daily Planet building he would always revert to Clark Kent, no matter what his power level was. The game also came with an area map that split up the districts of Metropolis and allowed Superman to use his superflight power to quickly change areas. Occasionally a "Help!" signal would appear on the map, such as a person being mugged, to which Superman could fly to that area immediately and aid the person in need.

At the end of each city level, or "chapter", the player battles a different boss and, upon defeating the boss, is given an animated front page of a Daily Planet newspaper praising their success. The second to the last chapter boss in the game is Lex Luthor. This is followed by three fights in a row against the exiled criminals from Krypton; Ursa, Non and General Zod at the "Statue of Freedom", which looks like the Statue of Liberty.

Source: Wikipedia, "Superman (Kemco game)", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

105390.name: Shaiya
105390.description:
Shaiya is a stunning free-to-play fantasy MMORPG that immerses players in a massive war between the forces of Light and Darkness. Shaiya allows players to quest for glory in solo or collaborative gaming, with many choosing to form powerful guilds capable of tackling some of the biggest and toughest monsters in the game. As players conquer challenges, they are rewarded with new weapons and armor that sanction their abilities to become dominant powers of Shaiya.

Source: The Publisher Website.

105391.name: Spectral Gene
105391.description:
User Summary

An SRPG that is a part of Idea Factory's Spectral series, which takes place in the Neverland universe. After deciding on characters to use battles play out on a grid where characters take turns attacking until victory or defeat conditions are met.

105392.name: Super Mario Bros. / Tetris / Nintendo World Cup
105392.description:
Super Mario Bros./Tetris/Nintendo World Cup is a Nintendo Entertainment System game developed and published by Nintendo. There are two versions of the game - a gold and a grey cartridge, both only obtainable from a Nintendo held championship in Europe, in November 1988. This competition cartridge is not to be confused with the 1990 Nintendo World Championship cart.

Source: Wikipedia, "Super Mario Bros./Tetris/Nintendo World Cup", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

105393.name: Reveal Fantasia: Riberu Fantajia Marieru to Yousei Monogatari
105393.description:
User Summary

A roleplaying game with no battles or combat elements. The game mostly consists of platforming and fetch quests.

105394.name: DragonSky
105394.description:
Back of the box

Dragon Sky is a 3D fantasy MMORPG that provides the ultimate martial arts gaming experience. Chose the skills and weapons you want to master and watch them come to life with ultra-realistic motion capturing.

105395.name: Elvandia Story
105395.description:
User Summary

A tactical role playing game released in Japan. Movement and battles play out similar to Fire Emblem/Shining Force where the camera switches to a view of the combatants whenever an attack is made.

105396.name: Street Cop
105396.description:
Released as Manhattan Police (マンハッタンポリス) in Japan, Street Cop is a game where the player has to chase after criminals while jumping over things and using the club to apprehend the foes. The player has to step on the buttons corresponding to each of the cop's actions, such as moving, jumping and clubbing. Street Cop was developed and published by Bandai. It was released on August 31, 1987 in Japan and in June 1989 in North America.

Source: Wikipedia, "Street Cop", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

105397.name: Sargon's Kingdom
105397.description:
Check out an older tile based strategy PnP game by Leiker Games, it's FREE!!

-Overview-
Play as a great King in ancient Mesopotamia, take control of your city state, and balance the expansion of your towns and territory held, versus the conquest of your enemy.
Two Game modes, Quick Battle and Grand Campaign, allows for different strategies and game length.

You can win via conquest of your opponents city state or economic victory, by building a set number of towns.

Sargon's Kingdom channels a little Carcassone (tile flipping and placement) and Settlers of Catan (Towns and resource generation) in this light beer and pretzels strategy game.

In SK Quick Battle, you start by laying a random 6x4 spread of tiles, Ore, Barley, Mountains, and Mountain Passes. The Grand battle sees you choosing were each drawn tile goes in an 8x6 spread.Each tile has a representative number that when rolled with a town built upon it, generates a resource. These resources can be used to build armies or towns.

Combat is undertaken by your armies that can stack up to a total of 3 armies per tile. Armies have different properties and abilities based on their stack size, Smaller armies can raze towns and move quickly, bigger armies can control occupied towns but move slowly.
Combat is resolved using standard D6's. Each Army receives 1D6 when attacking or defending and receives a success on a 5+. results are compared and if the attacker has a larger number of successes they destroy one of the defenders armies.

Towns, Mountains, and Mountain passes can generate defensive bonuses for your armies and Towns built upon Mountain Passes act as fortresses. creating an interesting tactical imperative for the placement and disposition of your towns.

-Items you'll need-
1 Yellow City State- Triangle Stand
1 Green City State- Triangle Stand
10 Yellow Towns- Houses
10 Green Towns- Houses
10 Yellow Armies- Stackable Pawns
10 Green Armies- Stackable Pawns
6 6 sided dice (6D6)
(or some other equivalent, coins were used in early iterations)

-Items included in the PDF's-
24 Barley Resource Cards
24 Ore Resource Cards
48 Tiles

Available on DrivethruRPG.com and BGG.

CopyRight DigiPen IoT

Created by Keith Leiker
Leiker Games
Give us a "Leik" on Facebook!

105398.name: Way of the Samurai 4
105398.description:
User Summary

Create a samurai and choose to align yourself with three different factions. The game features 10 different endings. Actions taken in one playthrough can influence what happens to you during your next playthrough.

Unlike the rest of the series the game has not been announced for a US release.

105399.name: Starship Hector
105399.description:
